parameter.name: seismo
parameter.description: Default filter type to use before processing and after deconvolution. It's possible to set : 1 for a Wood-Anderson seismometer 2 for a 5sec generic Seismometer 3 for a WWSSN LP seismometer 4 for a WSSN SP seismometer 5 for a Generic Seismometer 6 for a Butterworth Low pass filter 7 for a Butterworth High pass filter 8 for a Butterworth Band pass filter 9 for a 1Hz eigen-frequency L4C seismometer

parameter.name: taper
parameter.description: taper applied to the signal (in seconds)

parameter.name: signal_length
parameter.description: signal length used to compute the duration magnitude (in seconds)

parameter.name: butterworth
parameter.description: Butterworth filter parameter applied to the signal

parameter.name: depthmax
parameter.description: Maximum depth at which duration magnitude is valid

parameter.name: deltamax
parameter.description: Maximum distance between earthquake and station at which duration magnitude is valid

parameter.name: snrmin
parameter.description: Signal to noise ratio below which the coda is reached

parameter.name: mdmax
parameter.description: Maximum expected duration magnitude value This is used to find how much data should be loaded for a given station by reversing the formula

parameter.name: fma
parameter.description: FMA regional coefficient See Hypo2000 manual

parameter.name: fmb
parameter.description: FMB regional coefficient See Hypo2000 manual

parameter.name: fmd
parameter.description: FMD regional coefficient See Hypo2000 manual

parameter.name: fmf
parameter.description: FMF regional coefficient See Hypo2000 manual

parameter.name: fmz
parameter.description: FMZ regional coefficient See Hypo2000 manual
